resources.string: Set threshold speed\n（Click for detailed information）\n
Set shield time\n（Click for detailed information）\n
Switch to GSM/Wi-Fi automatically if the speed of the current network is inferior to the threshold speed.
Change the network modes(GSM/Wi-Fi) if it continues longer than the shield time that the speed of the current network is inferior to the threshold speed.
Connected to the Wi-Fi AP with the best signal in range, detailed information:
